paramInformation.label: Strobe Closed Interval
paramInformation.description: Relay 1 and 2 closed contacts time interval in strobe mode.

paramInformation.label: Strobe Open Interval
paramInformation.description: Relay 1 and 2 open contacts time interval in strobe mode.

paramInformation.label: Relay 1 Auto Off Delay
paramInformation.description: Relay will turn off automatically after time specified in this parameter. After receiving command On Relay 1 will be switched Off automatically with predefined delay.

paramInformation.label: Relay 1 On Delay
paramInformation.description: Relay 1 will be switched On with predefined delay.

paramInformation.label: Relay 1 Off Delay
paramInformation.description: Relay 1 will be switched Off with predefined delay.

paramInformation.label: Relay 1 Restore After Power Loss
paramInformation.description: Restore to the last known state for relay 1 after power was interrupted.

paramInformation.label: Hide Relay
paramInformation.description: Hide relay 2 in controller interface

paramInformation.label: Relay 2 Auto Off Delay
paramInformation.description: Relay will turn off automatically after time specified in this parameter. After receiving command On Relay 2 will be switched Off automatically with predefined delay.

paramInformation.label: Relay 2 On Delay
paramInformation.description: Relay 2 will be switched On with predefined delay.

paramInformation.label: Relay 2 Off Delay
paramInformation.description: Relay 2 will be switched Off with predefined delay.

paramInformation.label: Relay 2 Restore After Power Loss
paramInformation.description: Restore to the last known state for relay 2 after power was interrupted.

paramInformation.label: Control Relay 1 & 2 together
paramInformation.description: When enabled, Relay 2 will be switched On when Relay 1 is switched.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 1 Processing Options
paramInformation.description: Values of sensor 1 options for processing. Devices included in association group 2 will be using this parameter for controlling sensor 1.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 1 Send Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval to submit Sensor 1 readings to controller.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 2 Processing Options
paramInformation.description: Values of sensor 2 options for processing. Devices included in association group 3 will be using this parameter for controlling sensor 2.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 2 Send Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval to submit Sensor 2 readings to controller.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 3 On Level
paramInformation.description: Multilevel sensor 3 values for turning devices On in association group 4 or device itself. Note: Value selection depends on sensor type and its readings.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 3 Off Level
paramInformation.description: Multilevel sensor 3 values for turning devices Off in association group 4 or device itself. Note: Value selection depends on sensor type and its readings.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 3 Processing Options
paramInformation.description: Values of sensor 3 options for processing. Devices included in association group 4 will be using this parameter for controlling sensor 3.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 3 Level Change
paramInformation.description: Level change to trigger sending sensor change to controller. Default values depends on connected sensor type: temperature =1; humidity=5; luminosity=100 lux; power=50 Watt.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 3 Send Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval to submit Sensor 3 readings to association group 1.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 4 On Value
paramInformation.description: Multilevel sensor 4 values for turning devices On in association group 5 or device itself. Note: Value selection depends on sensor type and its readings.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 4 Off Value
paramInformation.description: Multilevel sensor 4 values for turning devices Off in association group 5 or device itself. Note: Value selection depends on sensor type and its readings.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 4 Processing Options
paramInformation.description: Values of sensor 4 options for processing. Devices included in association group 5 will be using this parameter for controlling sensor 4.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 4 Value Change
paramInformation.description: Value change interval to trigger sensor change to controller. Default values depends on connected sensor type: temperature =1; humidity=5; luminosity=100 lux; power=50 Watt.

paramInformation.label: Sensor 4 Send Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval to submit Sensor 4 readings to association group 1.

paramInformation.label: Require Secure Commands
paramInformation.description: React only to secure commands when device is in secure mode.

paramInformation.label: Secure Send Group 2
paramInformation.description: Send secure command signals for association group 2.

paramInformation.label: Secure Send Group 3
paramInformation.description: Send secure command signals for association group 3.

paramInformation.label: Secure Send Group 4
paramInformation.description: Send secure command signals for association group 4.

paramInformation.label: Secure Send Group 5
paramInformation.description: Send secure command signals for association group 5.

metadata.inclusion: Put the controller into inclusion mode, with security if supported. Connect power to the Z-Wave garage door controller. If already powered click inclusion/exclusion button on garage door controller three times.
metadata.exclusion: Put the controller into exclusion mode, Click the inclusion/exclusion button three times.
metadata.reset: The device is factory reset on exclusion from the network.
